title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 96.5 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 96.5 - General provisions

State Regulations

The general provisions shall be as follows: (a) No person shall fail to adhere to the
rules and regulations of the Long Island State Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Commission applicable to the area. (b) Except as otherwise provided for in this

Part, no person shall fail to adhere to the provisions of the Environmental

Conservation Law, and regulations fixed by order pursuant thereto, in relation
to open seasons, fishing hours, manner of taking and other regulations as they
apply to fishing in the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
96.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
